text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends Corrupt heartless soulless Donald Trump wants to slow down Covid-19 testing, dismantle the ACA during a pandemic.  Donald Trump delights in making dire situations even more dire which is why he must be gutted from the White House, and has the utter nerve to criticize Joe Biden.
